data: NIA Management of Suspected Opioid Overdose
Refer to Decision Support Tool: Management of Suspected Opioid Overdose
These guidelines are intended for use when no prescriber order(s) exists
If your unit has established opioid overdose procedures, continue to follow those procedures (for example, calling a Code Blue)
Notify treating provider Management of Suspected Opioid Overdose NIA has been initiated
